entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #61416
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61415
  • Duplicated attributes with multiple custom tag helpers #61410
  • Consider adding CancellationToken to Hub methods #61409
  • OpenApi generate duplicate schemas #61408
  • Open Api fails to generate correct schema type for some properties #61407
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-header-symbols, single_query #61406
  • HTTP/3 QUIC Binding Fails with 'Address Already in Use' Despite Port Being Free in .NET 9.0.201 #61403

Closed

  • <input> tag helper inserting hidden element with name __Invariant #60723
  • UB Build Failure: aspnetcore - Duplicate keys in file sign info #61413
  • [Blazor] Publish does not correctly clean publish\wwwroot\_framework folder #61364
  • Use Mask And Validation Attribute In blazor #61366
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-validation, caching #61397
  • Support responsive properties #61367

PullRequests

Merged

  • Http/3 Partial Frame support #61414
    area-networking, 10.0-preview4
  • Update branding to 2.3.2 #61417
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix preserving messages for stateful reconnect with backplane #61374
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 9.0.5
  • [release/8.0] Fix preserving messages for stateful reconnect with backplane #61375
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.16
  • Revert "Revert "[release/8.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60352
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.16
  • Revert "Revert "[release/9.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60353
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.5
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #61398
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.16
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #61393
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.5
  • [release/9.0] Caching SERedis critical bugfix; defer HC metadata detection because of DI cycle #60916
    Servicing-approved, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.5
  • Revert "Sign Mariner rpms with Mariner cert" #61405
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Revert "Revert "Revert "Revert "Update .NET build URLs"""" #61400
    area-infrastructure
  • OpenAPI: merge multiple body content types into one operation #61401
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Quarantine some OpenAPI tests #61349
    area-commandlinetools
  • [Blazor] Resolve collection for registered services once #61391
    area-blazor
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Use OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders=true in blazorwasm template #61036
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #60850
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos/FullTextSearch: consider adding default language at the model level #35929
    Backlog

Closed

  • Unable to materialize entity with enum discriminators #35892
  • Control Constraint Name using Fluent API #35928
  • Why did switching from nested querying to Include cause EF to repeat a table join? #35836

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Disable Cosmos tests on CI #35933
    ask-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35932

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #35925

Updated

  • Add model building support for complex type collections #35905
  • Cosmos Full Text Search support #35868
  • [release/9.0-staging] Cosmos Full Text Search support (query part) #35909
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35927
  • SQLite: implement MAX/MIN/ORDER BY for `decimal` #35606
    community-contribution
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switch control shows a big end margin. #28901
  • Type 'MainPage' already defines a member called 'InitializeComponent' with the same parameter types #28898
  • [NET10] Make `VisualElement.ComputeConstraintForView` and `LayoutConstraint` enum public #28897
    .NET 10 Planning
  • CollectionView2 Handler for Windows based on ItemsRepeater #28895
    .NET 10.0-preview6
  • [iOS] CarouselView with Bindable Gradient Border crash app #28893
  • Capture video crashes after stopping recording on Android 12 #28891
  • Android MediaPicker Format Behaviour #28888
  • [System.TypeInitializationException]: The type initializer for 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VisualElement' threw an exception. #28877

Closed

  • Remove Android API check for device test results #28007
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Entry field does not track binding #5436
    Backlog
  • AppResources.<lang>.resx files get ignored with windows x64 build #20828
    Backlog
  • Udefined Text in MAUI TimePicker on iOS #28786
    Backlog
  • Slow Scrolling Performance in CollectionView or ScrollView #17326
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Visibility Property Not Updating as Expected in .NET MAUI #28677
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [9.0.50] CollectionView display is broken when setting IsVisible after items are added #28415
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Issue with GIF Image on iOS – Transparent GIF Background Displays as White #28714
    .NET 9 SR6
  • I8-The footer position is not on the far right of the horizontal grid #28821
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Azure DevOps pipeline fails as MAUI workload moves microsoft.net.sdk.ios from 18.2.9180 to 18.4.9288 #28881
  • MAUI with xcode 16.3 #28880
  • XAML source generation (experimental) #28832
    .NET 10 Planning
  • .NET 9 iOS crashing on device in release mode at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.RunContinuations #28197
    .NET 10 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Versions.props to 9.0.70 SR7 #28900
  • [ai] Add release notes prompt #28896
  • [iOS] Fixed the TargetInvocationException Occurs When Selecting Header/Footer After Changing ItemsLayout in CV2 #28890
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28867 #28889
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [Android] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was applied to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #28886
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28885
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix FlyoutPage does not respond to changes in the FlyoutLayoutBehavior property #28884
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Changes to fix Android emulators boot issues on Linux #28882
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fixed a NullReferenceException when starting application with empty shell on Windows #28879
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Start adding the ability to intercept all requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Backport uitest fixes to .NET9 SR5 #28871
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Update Versions.props to 9.0.60 SR6 #28899
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky tests which randomly fails on CI - 9 #28887
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28862
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Revert "Revert "Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation (#28756)" (#28872)" #28873
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Revert "[Accessibility] Add 'button' for TalkBalk on Android Tap Gesture Recognizers" #28868
    p/0, area-gestures, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Revert Applying visibility change to child controls #28869
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [iOS] Fix for Transparent Background Color not applied to WebView #28804
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • The footer position is not on the far right of the horizontal grid - fix #28864
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve TFM condition for sample content template #28865
    area-templates

Updated

  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fixed KeepLastItemInView for CV1 and added support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Stop iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation by looking at VisualElement computed Constraint #28479
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] Add SingleSelectionFollowsFocus Platform Specific property #28352
    proposal/open, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y
  • [Android] Fix for WebView Fails to Load URLs with Certain Encoded Characters #27003
    community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Fix for the File.ContentType from MediaPicker not being in valid MIME format #28842
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, essentials-file-picker
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Update gradle version for AndroidNative app from 7.6.1 to 8.10.2. #27859
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [xamlc] convert `{OnIdiom}` to `OnIdiomExtension<T>` #28700
    area-xaml
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] Removing outdated menu items as Android can delete them after switching activities #28767
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed NullReferenceException when using x:Name with SolidColorBrush #28805
    area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/11] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28867
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Overriding back button functionality with OnBackButtonPressed returning false in a modally pushed page causes stack overflow - fix #28812
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR7
  • Include all platforms in multi project template #28766
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length #23877
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Fixed the Incorrect Text Color Applied to Selected Tab in TabbedPage #28844
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Picker - focus/unfocus events #28122
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Update Test HostApp to not use TableView #28830
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, area-controls-listview
  • Fixed the span text disappeared in label when setting the font attribute on span and setting an implicit style for Label on content page #28851
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Path Rendering Issue Inside StackLayout When Margin Is Set #28071
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Documentation needs options or examples #78089
  • Many CodeFixProvider such as CSharpAddImportCodeFixProvider does not work on WASM #78079

Closed

  • Re-enable TransitiveVersionPinning for RoslynAnalyzers folder #78036
  • Inconsistent behaviour between var vs explicit type when used with out parameter and conditional expression #77558
  • Compiler tests don't report warning for pointer to System.Nullable #77725
  • vscode shows metadata names in document outline #78072

PullRequests

Created

  • Use output parent directory to reduce guardian scan #78090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support consumption of instance compound assignment operators #78087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • CSharp Completion Context - Add overriden member context #78085
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move test helpers to NetLatest #78082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Split query execution into compile and execute calls #78081
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove unused ISemanticSearchWorkspaceHost #78083
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add back EA.Razor for servicing branches #78088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Bind compound assignment operator declarations #77999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Remove EditorFeatures from OOP #78069
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Ensure LSP uses actual signature help trigger characters #78076
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not return metadata names for document symbols #78077
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [main] Update RoslynAnalyzer package projects with dependencies #78075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Improve detection of code whose updates may not have effect #78009
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify internal analyzer api #78070
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update RoslynAnalyzer package projects with dependencies #78068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Expression trees: support optional arguments and named arguments in parameter order #77972
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Generate documentation - update API shape #78067
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement support for triggering Fix All from additional files #74695
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Implement custom awaitable support #78071
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Runtime Async, Next
  • Stop producing 32-bit NGEN Images for VS #78074
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Update resourceManagement.yml #77948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.14] Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #78055
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Field Keyword, 17.14
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update ignored directives public API #77968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Remove EditorFeatures reference from ServiceHub #78043
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing test coverage of event pipe shutdown handlers #114461
  • [cDAC] Implement APIs used by WinDBG/CDB to load a managed dump #114460
  • [API Proposal]: Implement Linq Sum for System.Numerics.Vectors #114456
  • Support precompiling 'ComInterfaceEntry.IID' fields from RVA span fields in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #114455
  • [API Proposal]: MLKem #114453
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add SearchValues Overloads to SequenceReader #114451
  • [maccatalyst][x64] SendTo_.*.Datagram_UDP_AccessDenied_Throws_DoesNotBind cannot reach host #114450
  • The third argument to System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MakeUnary is not marked nullable, but it's contract expects null. #114446
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OBJECTREF. Possible GC hole.") #114445
    10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: ConditionalSelect IsVectorZero check will never trigger for Op1 #114443
    10.0.0
  • Use SearchValues in System.Text.Encodings.Web #114437
    Future
  • [Android] Improve native stack traces when the app crashes because of a signal on CoreCLR #114436
  • ARM64-SVE: Optimise away instruction when mask is all false #114433
  • ARM64-SVE: Use non predicated instruction when mask is all true #114431
  • [Trimming Analyzer] Handle foreach over arrays returned from Type.GetInterfaces #114425
  • [API Proposal]: TextEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncode(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #114423
    Future

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Inconsistent profile data"' during 'Importation' #114229
    10.0.0
  • Mono.Linker.Tests.TestCases.All.DataFlow test failure #114458
  • Mono.Linker.Tests.TestCases.All.DataFlow failing consistently #114426
  • OOM in Dns query can crash #113419
    10.0.0
  • Unexpected Performance Degradation in Second Call to Delegate.DynamicInvoke #114430
  • .LastIndexOf returns incorrect value #114402
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect behavior of string.IndexOf in different cultures #111340
    10.0.0
  • string.Contains returns wrong result on net-ios with .net 9 #110609
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IDistributedCache overloads with ReadOnlyMemory<byte> support #70137
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!stmt->IsPhiDefnStmt()' during 'Assertion prop' #114275
    10.0.0
  • Host tracing to file should append PID to file name #3474
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [DRAFT] Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make it possible to preinitialize `ComInterfaceEntry` #114459
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fix loop recognition bug in .NET 8 #114457
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [coreclr][android] Don't build/ship unused GC variants for Android #114448
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android
  • Remove useless argument from RedirectForThrowControl #114444
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add pattern matching for SVE intrinsics that operate on mask operands #114438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix issue when logging stack overflow in WinForm apps. #114432
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] Consider WasmSDK projects RID agnostic #114429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • HybridCache: add net10 HybridCache zero-alloc fetch API #114427
    api-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Zip async implementation #114421
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Encourage inlining of il throw test #114420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Detect inconsistency in small profile weights for finally exits #114447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic divide (take2) #114352
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't use `Delegate.Method` in ServiceDescriptor #114008
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Extend type preinitialization support #114374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Baseline new warning in trimming tests #114424
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove reference / redistribution of externally provided packages in MSBuild tasks #113404
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 9.0.5
  • Propagate exceptions in `GetAddressInfoExCallback` #113444
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • ML-KEM: PEM Exports (and missing overloads) #114360
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Reenable workloads build temporarily, only publish workload msi nugets #114452
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm][interp] Fix PackedSimd.Splat intrinsic lookup #114413
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • XML documentation for `ProviderAliasAttribute` improved. #114408
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Rename WriteImportMapToHtml to OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders #114434
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Add ShutdownGuard in DynamicOptimizations test #114435
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark profiler\DynamicOptimization test JitOptimizationSensitive #114417
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser] remove profiler from samples #114428
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Delete dead code #114419
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm coreclr] simplify build #114111
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • Replace CodeManState with cache in EECodeInfo for x86. #114170
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure proper interpreter frames ordering #114418
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove useless assert from assertprop #114332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CultureName "c" and "C" get mapped to Invariant Culture #114328
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix cast in preinitialization test #114422
  • Switch OSR patchpoint identity to <func version, IL offset> #114381
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 135.0.7049.52, windows: 135.0.7049.42 #114303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SVE: Slightly better calculation of stack frame for ldr/str #114284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][interp] Add Round alias #114399
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make host trace to `<exe_name>.<pid>.log` if `COREHOST_TRACEFILE` is set to a directory #114362
    area-Host
  • JIT: add note on stack security (GS) #114356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Prepare cert tests for new signing algorithms #114416
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 10.0.0
  • Reimplement PR 112032, preserve trailing extra data when updating ZIP files #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `Stream.ReadAtLeast` when loading ZipArchives #114256
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Name native threads before start (macOS/Native AOT) #114249
    area-System.Threading
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Replace use of DAMT.All in ComponentModel with a more restricted set #114126
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use PME identity for DAC signing #113997
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Dev/rokonec/101022 httplistner mem leak #114098
    area-System.Net
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet test` fails with "Bad IL format" when running on .NET 9 SDK (9.0.203) but works with .NET 8 SDK #48320
  • H #48294

Closed

  • dotnet nuget why doesn't spot existence of dependency #47982
  • Ensure `TestTfmsInParallel` works for the new dotnet test experience #47496
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet run app.cs is creating obj if there are shebang directives #48278
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Support OfficialBuildId for SB #48327
